metadata.title: Chairman Senate condemns terrorist attack in Turbat

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 5 (APP):Chairman Senate Syed Yousaf Raza Gillani strongly condemned the terrorist attack in Turbat, Balochistan, where a blast targeted a bus traveling from Karachi to Turbat. The Chairman Senate expressed deep sorrow over the loss of lives and conveyed heartfelt condolences to the bereaved families. aTerrorists are the enemies of progress and are fearful of Pakistanas development,a he remarked, adding that their aim is to disrupt the nationas journey toward prosperity by spreading chaos. Gillani affirmed the unwavering determination of Pakistanas people and security forces to eradicate terrorism from its roots. aWe stand resolute in our fight against these heinous acts of violence,a he said. Syed Yousaf Raza Gillani also prayed for the swift recovery of the injured and assured that all necessary measures would be taken to bring the perpetrators of attack to justice. The blast, which occurred in the New Bahman area of Turbat, claimed the lives of four individuals and injured 32 others.
content.summary: Chairman Senate Syed Yousaf Raza Gillani condemned a terrorist attack in Turbat, Balochistan, which targeted a bus. He expressed condolences to the families of the victims and vowed to fight against terrorism.
